    [{closeform}] [% #maybe TODO - change from superdoc to superdocnolinks my $list = $query->param('alpha'); return unless $list; my $leOpen = ''; my $leClose = ''; my $s = $VARS->{'alphabetizer_sep'}; if($s==1) { $leClose = '<br>' } elsif($s==2) { $leOpen = '<li>'; $leClose = '</li>'; } else { #no formatting } my @entries = split "\n", $list; foreach(@entries) { s/^\s*(.*?)\s*$/$1/; # s/^(\w)/uc($1)/e; #no reason to capitalize # Put articles at the end so they don't screw up # the sort. $_ =~ s/^(An?)     '.$str.'
    '; %]
